articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: As the broader cryptocurrency market bleeds red, several Layer-1 coins, like Zilliqa and Near, are facing significant losses.
articles.title: Zilliqa, NEAR Protocol Suffer Double-Digit Losses as Crypto Market Dips

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission has so far approved only BTC futures ETFs.
articles.title: Grayscale Renews Push With SEC for Bitcoin Spot ETF

articles.description: Plus: NFT project Akutars got off to a calamitous start when $34 million was permanently locked into a faulty smart contract.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: SEC Proposal Ruffles More Feathers, Bored Apes Back in Spotlight

articles.description: Mistakes in the code for the prominent project launch mean that $34M worth of ETH is apparently inaccessible.
articles.title: Aku Ethereum NFT Launch Ends With $34M Locked in Flawed Smart Contract

articles.description: The metaverse investor and NFT game publisher recently picked up three game developers—with potentially more to come.
articles.title: Animoca Brands ‘Not Done Acquiring’ Studios to Make NFT Games: Chairman

articles.author: Sally Wang
articles.description: China first considered a CBDC in 2014, ramping up research in 2019. Now it's live and in wide use, and could lead other countries to follow.
articles.title: The Beijing Olympics Was the Coming Out Party for China’s Digital Yuan. What Comes Next?

articles.author: Stephen Graves
articles.description: Documentary "Project Iceman" will be funded through NFT sales, after the producers turned down a $1.25 million offer from a streaming service.
articles.title: NFT-Backed Film 'Project Iceman' Tracks Antarctica Triathlon Attempt of Anders Hofman

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: Since the launch, shares are down more than 15%. Since January, the stock has dropped more than 47%.
articles.title: Coinbase Stock Hits All-Time Low After Ethereum NFT Marketplace Rollout

articles.description: With roughly $16 billion in value on Terra’s Anchor, the project constitutes over half of all DeFi activity for the Terra ecosystem.

articles.description: Among the few leading coins to post gains were Apecoin, Monero, and Terra's Luna. Bitcoin Cash and Ethereum Classic each fell about 8%.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin Back Below $40K, Markets Mostly Flat

articles.description: Critics of Coinbase NFT say the exchange is too late to a now-crowded field. But it would be a mistake to dismiss Coinbase's effort.
articles.title: Did Coinbase Blow Its NFT Launch? Not So Fast

articles.description: Three additional wallets have been tied to North Korea’s Lazarus hacking group following March’s Axie Infinity sidechain attack.
articles.title: US Treasury Links More Ethereum Wallets to $622M Ronin Network Hack

articles.description: According to Reuters, Russian intelligence was trying to track Bitcoin sent to opposition leader Alexei Navalny.
articles.title: Binance Refutes Allegations It Shared User Data With Russian Intelligence

articles.description: The first Nike metaverse NFT wearables are now live, complete with style-changing Skin Vial NFTs.
articles.title: Nike and RTFKT Reveal CryptoKicks—Their First Ethereum NFT Metaverse Sneakers

articles.description: Emily Yang, aka pplpleasr, the inspiration for the NFT collective PleasrDAO, talked DAOs and crypto interest groups on Decrypt's gm podcast with Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts. Yang says people shouldn't be joining DAOs with the aim of making money; she compares them to Subreddits or video game clans.
articles.title: NFT Artist pplpleasr: 'You Should Be Thinking of DAOs Like Subreddits'

articles.description: The new venture was built in collaboration with the Project Columbus DAO.
articles.title: Privacy Blockchain Findora Launches Ethereum-Based Testnet 'Yellow Submarine'

articles.description: The central bank’s move is to stop “unproductive capital outflows.”
articles.title: Ukraine Bans Cryptocurrency Purchases in Local Currency

articles.title: Silk Road Bitcoin Stash Will Be Used to Pay Ross Ulbricht's $184 Million Fine

articles.description: Decentralized apps and services are widely impacted this morning due to shared infrastructure from Infura.
articles.title: MetaMask, Ethereum Apps Down as Infura Suffers Outage

articles.description: The DAO’s proposal to invest in the NFT acquisition collective passed unanimously.
articles.title: Peter Thiel-Backed BitDAO Votes to Invest $6.5 Million Into Ethereum NFT Collective PleasrDAO

articles.description: Stripe continues its crypto endeavors with a new pilot program that will let some Twitter users get paid in the popular stablecoin USDC.
articles.title: Payments Giant Stripe to Pilot Crypto Payouts With Twitter

articles.description: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao tweeted this morning that North Korean hackers attempted to channel the loot through "over 86 accounts" today.
articles.title: Binance Recovers $5.8M From $622M Axie Infinity Bridge Theft

articles.description: Following news that Tron plans to roll out a new algorithmic stablecoin, the network’s native token TRX has jumped more than 7%.
articles.title: Tron's TRX Token Jumps 7% On News of Native Algorithmic Stablecoin

articles.description: Crusoe uses "digital flare mitigation" to repurpose untapped natural gas into electricity for Bitcoin mining.
articles.title: Bitcoin Firm Crusoe Energy Raises $505 Million to Grow Flare-Gas Mining Business

articles.title: 'Alien' Director Ridley Scott to Produce Film About Ethereum's Rise

articles.description: Afterparty is positioning itself to become the first go-to NFT ticketing site that offers fans extra perks.
articles.title: Paris Hilton Invests in Afterparty’s $4 Million Raise for Polygon NFT Ticketing

articles.description: Poor coding has resulted in some NBA fans losing out on the NFTs that they were promised. But the league says it will make it up to them.
articles.title: NBA Botches Ethereum NFT Drop as 'The Association' Suffers Exploit

articles.description: Privacy coin Monero is surging on news of an upcoming hard fork slated for July and a group of enthusiasts that stirred a crypto bank run.
articles.title: Monero Rallies 22% in a Week Amid Hard Fork Announcement and 'Monerun'

articles.title: NEAR Lending Project Bastion Raises $9M Series A Led By Three Arrows

articles.description: Powered by DeFi, Ethereum holders have raked in more realized gains than Bitcoin in 2021, according to a Chainalysis report.
articles.title: Ethereum Earned Global Investors $76.3B in Realized Gains in 2021 Thanks to DeFi: Report

articles.title: British Department Store Harvey Nichols Opens NFT Space in Hong Kong

articles.title: 0x Token Soars 53% Following Coinbase NFT Partnership

articles.description: Crypto’s largest exchange has announced that it will restrict services to Russian users with more than €10,000 in their Binance accounts.
articles.title: Binance Limits Crypto Services to Russian Users After EU’s Latest Sanctions Package

articles.description: Despite the massive hack and the play-to-earn game’s struggling economy, metaverse investor Animoca Brands remains bullish.
articles.title: Why Animoca Brands Invested More Money Into Axie Infinity Despite $622M Hack

articles.description: The Treasury department added Moscow-based BitRiver to its Specially Designated Nationals list.
articles.title: US Government Sanctions Russian Bitcoin Miner

articles.description: Binance's new Twitter emoji needed some more focus group testing.
articles.title: Binance Changes Twitter Emoji After Original Resembled Swastika—On Hitler's Birthday

articles.author: Jeff Benson
articles.description: The Irish government wants to remove dark money from the election process.
articles.title: Ireland Preparing to Ban Bitcoin Donations Over Russia Election Interference Fears

articles.description: Retired NASA astronaut Scott Kelly talks to Decrypt’s Andrew Hayward about his new Ethereum NFT collection, which benefits relief efforts in Ukraine, plus the cryptocurrencies he holds and his excitement about the metaverse.
articles.title: Astronaut Scott Kelly Discusses NFT Project, Crypto Holdings, and the Metaverse

articles.description: Gemini COO Noah Perlman talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Gemini's approach to competing with other exchanges, its focus on regulatory compliance, and his own views on Bitcoin maximalists.
articles.title: Gemini COO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Robinhood Crypto CTO Johann Kerbrat talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Bitcoin Miami 2022 about Robinhood's new Lightning Network integration, potential NFT plans, and Kerbrat's personal history with crypto, including mining Bitcoin back in 2010.
articles.title: Robinhood Crypto CTO Talks to Decrypt at Bitcoin Miami 2022

articles.description: Emily Yang aka pplpleasr never thought she'd be an online celebrity. But in 2021 an NFT version of a digital ad she did for Uniswap sold for $525,000 to a DAO of her fans, and now she's among the most famous NFT artists. She speaks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the rise of NFT art, the traditional art world taking it seriously, NFT haters, and which NFT marketplaces can beat OpenSea.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 7: pplpleasr and the NFT Art Revolution

articles.description: The legendary rapper, actor, and entrepreneur Ice Cube talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward about why his BIG3 basketball league plans to offer fractional team ownership in the form of NFTs, plus his personal interest in crypto.
articles.title: Ice Cube: Crypto and NFTs Are ‘The Ultimate Fuck You to the Mainstream’

articles.description: Tax Day is coming, and the crypto world is paying attention. Decrypt's Jeff Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Adriana Hamacher discuss what people and businesses need to know about crypto and taxes with special guest Nicholas Mowbray of Baker Hostetler.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Crypto, Taxes, and You

articles.description: Caitlin Long spent nearly two decades at big banks Credit Suisse and Morgan Stanley before she went all in on Bitcoin. Now her company Custodia is seeking to offer banking services to crypto companies long shut out by the big banks. She talks to Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about identifying as a Bitcoin maximalist, crypto regulation in DC, and Web3 culture.
articles.title: gm Podcast, Episode 6: Ditching Big Banks for Bitcoin With Caitlin Long

articles.description: Politicians are embracing crypto on both sides of the aisle. Matt West, running for congress in Oregon, Matthew Diemer, running for congress in Ohio, and former Wyoming Rep. Tyler Lindholm discussed crypto and politics on a panel with Decrypt's Jeff Roberts at Camp Ethereal in Wyoming. As Diemer pointed out, "We have a conservative Republican, a progressive Democrat, and a moderate Democrat on the same stage, unified by crypto and the idea of making sensible regulation."
articles.title: Crypto on the Campaign Trail: Matt West, Matthew Diemer, Tyler Lindholm at Camp Ethereal 2022

articles.description: Tax season is upon us, and crypto investors have questions. Tony Dhanjal, Head of Tax at crypto tax software service Koinly, shares tips in this sponsored segment.
articles.title: Crypto Taxes Got You Down? Software Can Help
